name: Concrete
description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

name: Iron Plate
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Iron Rod
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Power Shard
description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

name: Packaged Fuel
description:
Fuel.
Packaged Fuel, either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

name: Iodine Infused Filter
description: Used in hazmat suits to filter out radioactive particles in the air.

name: Spiked Rebar
description: Ammo for the Rebar Gun.

name: Cartridge
description: Ammo for the Rifle.

name: HUB Parts
description: The parts required to build the basic structure of the HUB.

name: Wire
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Filter
description: Used in gas masks to filter out pollutants in the air.

name: Cable
description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

name: Reinforced Iron Plate
description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

name: Copper Ingot
description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

name: Screw
description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

name: Smart Plating
description: Project Part #1. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Versatile Framework
description: Project Part #2. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Automated Wiring
description: Project Part #3. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Modular Engine
description: Project Part #4. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Adaptive Control Unit
description: Project Part #5. Send up the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

name: Iron Ingot
description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
description: Thin lightweight & highly durable sheet that is mainly used for products that need to be light or have high heat conduction.

name: Motor
description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

name: Rubber
description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

name: Circuit Board
description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

name: Copper Sheet
description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

name: Plastic
description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

name: Encased Industrial Beam
description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

name: Steel Pipe
description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

name: Fuel
description: Fuel is either converted into electricity or as fuel for vehicles.

name: Polymer Resin
description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

name: Heavy Oil Residue
description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

name: Petroleum Coke
description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

name: Modular Frame
description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

name: Rotor
description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

name: Steel Ingot
description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

name: Alumina Solution
description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into pure Aluminum.

name: Aluminum Scrap
description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

name: Aluminum Ingot
description: Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap. It is mostly used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

name: Silica
description: Derived from quartz, commonly used in structural materials and microelectronics.

name: Computer
description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

name: Heavy Modular Frame
description: A more robust multi-purpose frame.

name: Steel Beam
description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

name: Caterium Ingot
description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

name: High-Speed Connector
description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

name: Stator
description: The static parts of a motor

name: A.I. Limiter
description: A.I. Limiter are super advanced electronics that are used to control A.I.s and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

name: Quickwire
description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

name: Quartz Crystal
description: Used for radar and quantum technology.

name: Turbofuel
description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in Fuel Generators.

name: Empty Canister
description: Used to package fluids for transportation. Can be recycled.

name: Packaged Turbofuel
description: Packaged Turbofuel, a more efficient alternative to Fuel. Used in vehicles.

name: Crystal Oscillator
description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
description: Control Rods regulate power expenditure via electromagnetism.

name: Supercomputer
description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

name: Sulfuric Acid
description: A liquid mostly used to extract elements from ore.

name: Black Powder
description: An explosive powder that is commonly used in explosives and cartridges.

name: Heat Sink
description: Used to dissipate heat faster.

name: Turbo Motor
description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

name: Battery
description: Batteries store an electrical charge. They are primarily used as a power source.

name: Radio Control Unit
description: Enhances and directs radio signals

name: Nobelisk
description: Can be used with the Nobelisk Detonator to blow up cracked boulders, vegetation or other vulnerable targets.

name: Green Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport.

name: Color Cartridge
description:
Ammo for the Color Gun.
Necessary to change the color of factory buildings and vehicles.

name: Yellow Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

name: Purple Power Slug
description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.
